Title: Dark Cave Phong Nha Tours
Description: A friend and I came to the cave and spent a hilarious couple of hours getting involved in the sporty and active adventure within the cave. We missed the safety video which in hindsight would have been helpful as we did not know how to successfully stop ourselves as the bottom of the zipline (we both graciously crashed into the mat). We had a lot of fun with our tour guide who helped us get equipped with helmets and torches before we acclimatised to the cold water, swam 10-40m to the cave entrance and hiked in through a muddy pathway. The guide called out when we needed to slow down to get safely through the tunnel. We arrived at a mud bath which was very slippery but the whole group loved getting fully involved in the mud and we had a great laugh all together. If you do not want to get muddy, this trip is NOT for you. Then we went back out for a cold dip and to remove the mud from our bodies and clothing, before kayaking (which was a lot of effort after we had laughed so much) back to the adventure course. This part is optional but we stayed and did a mini zip line, a big dive into the water and a small assault course over the water. A very fun afternoon and well worth the price if you are with a good group of adventurous people!

Title: Pure Vietnam Travel
Description:
Eine wunderschöne zwei tages Bootstour in der Bai Tu Long Bay. Anders als wie bei anderen Booten wurde die Gruppe sehr klein gehalten (8x Pers.) wodurch es mehr als genügend Platz und ruhige Minuten gab. Die Zimmer waren groß, geräumig und sehr sauber. Der Meerblick vom Bett aus war wunderschön. /Frühstück/Essen war sehr gut. Die Kanu Tour war das Highlight, da wir für sehr lange Zeit (geschätzt 30 - 45 min) an den Inseln vorbei gepaddelt sind, ohne eine andere Touristengruppe zu sehen. Auch der Stand zu dem wir gepaddelt sind war fast menschenleer und wunderschön. Als dann der Ansturm auf den Stand kam, waren wir bereits fertig und paddelten zurück. Der Ausflug zur Höhle am zweiten Tag war auch sehenswert, aber sehr touristisch. Eine Gruppe nach der anderen wurde durch die Höhle geschläust. Zusammenfassend war der zweitägige Trip zur Bai Tu Long Bay wunderschön, und wir würden auf jedenfall erneut die Tour buchen. Verglichen zur Ha Long Bay viel weniger touristisch.

Danke auch an Ms. Bac (Pure Vietnam Travel) für die super Beratung. Ohne Sie wären wir sicherlich bei der überfüllten Ha Long Bay gelandet.

I can't say enough good things about their service, amazingly personal and responsive to my endless emails and WhatsApp messages.

Vien and the rest of the staff on the ferry were excellent, really friendly professional services. Super easy border crossing. Our party had the ferry to ourselves going down, so very comfortable. Bruce met us at the ferry terminal in Chau Doc and helped to get us set-up with SIM cards for Vietnam, then picked us up in the morning from hotel for a ride back to the dock.

The next morning we set-off for a 5 day charter on one of Mandarin's slow boats. Highly recommend if you're looking for a unique experience for a few days and have a sense of adventure. Very relaxing, just sipping drinks, playing cards and watching the world go by. There are endless small canals and waterways in the area to explore, and plenty of small towns along the way to stop along the way and get a room. Our captain was excellent, very accommodating to our requests. Basically worked like a self-hire boat with pilot, he took us anywhere on Google maps we wanted to go (but be prepared to do some of your own navigating).

These guys are pros and really put in the effort to provide a high standard of service. While everyone else said "no" to my travel plans, these guys went the extra mile to make it special.

Title: Туоператор МИР ТУР
Description: Здравствуйте. Мы с супругом первый раз во Вьетнаме. Как всегда туроператор, который привёз нас, стал навязчиво предлагать свои экскурсии и критиковать, как они говорят, «уличные турагентства». Но мы всё же не побоялись и купили поездку в Далат у туроператора Мир Тур. 11 марта 2020 года с супругом посетили этот красивый город. Экскурсия оказалась просто замечательной!!! Во-первых, хотела бы отметить организацию. Все очень четко, отлаженно, по времени. Побывали в очень многих красивых местах и везде без проблем, загвоздок. Транспорт хороший, водитель - профессионал своего дела. Во-вторых, следует сказать о подборе программы и посещаемых мест. На наш взгляд, мы смогли посетить всё самое лучшее, красивое и интересное. Причём это было без излишней рекламы и навязанного «шопинг». А, в-третьих, отдельно хотелось бы рассказать о гиде Юлие, которая сопровождала нас. Высоко профессиональный, эрудированный, образованный, очень культурный человек. Она на протяжении всей экскурсии 12 часов рассказывала нам о стране, традициях, жизни Вьетнама. Мы узнали очень много интересного, полезного и необычного, что не прочитаешь ни в одном путеводителе. Лично я осталась под впечатлением от увиденного и услышанного. Title: Viet Han Dental Clinic
Description: Хотел бы оставить отзыв и благодарность замечательным сотрудникам этой стоматологической клиники! Попал я сюда по совету своей знакомой, у меня было воспаление после удаления зуба мудрости. Я мучился уже две недели с температурой и постоянными болями, жил только на обезболивающих, не мог ни спать, ни есть. Врач, который удалил мне этот зуб (в другой клинике) говорил, что так и должно быть. А тут с самого порога меня встретили приятные, квалифицированные сотрудники. Сервис и внимательное отношение к пациентам - это то, что ставят на первое место в этой клинике и это очень приятно!Отдельное спасибо девушке администратору по имени Vy, очень внимательная и хорошо говорит по английски. Я заполнил анкету и познакомился с русскоговорящей девушкой-доктором по имени Оань. Я объяснил ей свою проблему. Меня отвели в очень чистый, хорошо оборудованный кабинет, врачи осмотрели место удаления зуба и сказали,что в лунку попали остатки пищи и началось воспаление. Было принято решение сделать чистку и продезинфицировать воспалившиеся место. Все было сделано максимально качественно, аккуратно и безболезненно. Через час после того, как отошла анестезия, я в первый раз за две недели почувствовал настоящее облегчение. После чистки лунка успешно зажила и я уже ходил к Доктору Оань на лечение зубов. Все точно также качественно и безболезненно, также очень радует то, что в этом месте не стараются заработать на тебе как можно больше, а дают объективную оценку для конкретного случая. Для меня это лучшая клиника в Нячанге!!!

Title: HAPPY PLUS TRAVEL
Description:
I had a wonderful time visiting the Cu Chi Tunnels and the Mekong Delta with the help of David, who was an excellent planner and organizer. He understood my requirements well and was always available for any kind of query resolution. He arranged the best tour guide one can ask for, Mr Bui, who had deep knowledge on our tours and Saigon culture and always kept the group intact with beautiful stories and history.

I was scared of being asked for tips at random places as I had read about it (especially in Mekong Delta). When I let David know the same, he made sure that we were comfortable everywhere by letting the tour guide know in advance who would then always come up if he saw someone persuading for tips. So we had nothing to worry about on this perspective and this reassurance of not worrying about anything made our trip really mesmerizing.

Our requests for vegetarian food and small group (< 10 pax) were also considered, so the tour guide could focus on us and it was not crowded. Our limousine bus was extremely comfortable, very silent so we got a good amount of time to relax in between and yes not to forget cold water bottle was provided 500 ml each and pickup & drop was exactly from the hotel point. Excellent Hospitality & the pickup and drop services were well informed in advance.

Unlike many tours that are about money, here the focus is solely on hospitality and rich experience. We were given options to pay for the trip whenever we felt the most comfortable with - be it cash or online payment (with no platform charges for international travellers, so we paid exactly what was asked). Along with the bigger things, all the other little things, like proper wait time for restrooms and time for breakfast, were adequately provided for each one of us.

David made our day in HCMC really brighter and I would 101% recommend him to anyone for any kind of trip planning. He is the best planner you can find in HCMC!

Dear Imperial Travel: I need your special help to visit my adopted son's village in the remote mountains of North Vietnam.

This message I sent is how it all started. The best day ever. The last day my adopted son saw his birth Mother. The day him, his birth siblings and I climbed the mountain to pray for their dying Mother. And the people who made this possible: Hein and his team at Imperial Travel.

Of course Imperial Travel took care of us in Hanoi. We stayed at the very best hotel, The Imperial Hotel. They took care of an excellent driver and car to take us 3 hours away into the rice/mountain country. Of course they took us to the best local restaurants along the way. Of course they added in other trips to resorts and even an overnight boat cruise to Halong Bay. They do all of that better than anyone else. Of course they do.

But what no one else can do, Imperial Travel will. They will make your trip become the BEST DAY OF YOUR LIFE. (Day, Week, month, whatever.) If you have a special dream, they will make it happen.

My dream - to somehow have my son be able to communicate and bond with his birth family. They don't speak the same language. Hein was an excellent translator, however they needed to bond in another way too. My dream was to climb the giant mountain behind their stilt house. And to have all of us hike up that mountain. Hein embraced my idea and presented it in a way that everyone in the family agreed to come along.

It turns out no foreigner ever hiked that mountain before me. And the people who go up that mountain are doing it for collecting of food, medicine, firewood, etc. Everyone works too hard to have time to go on a "hike" for fun. So this was indeed an unusual happening in this village. And everyone in the village came out to watch us go.

My son and his birth siblings didn't need language to catch cray fish and hunt for our food on the mountain. They bonded and it was things they all really liked to do. My son, when he was little, had a strange passion for catching cray fish. I could never understand it. Now I do.

Sister and I prayed at the tippy top. Her in a Buddah meditation pose and me with my catholic hands folded. We prayed for the dying Birth Mom.

Then we had this amazing meal. They killed and cooked the chicken that the little cousins carried up the mountain. It was the best chicken ever. And they also brought each of us a beer. It tasted so good.

The funny thing was... Guess who turned to me and said:
"This is the Best Day of My Life"

Hein, the owner of Imperial Travel!

It was the Best day of all of our lives - All of us on that mountain that day.

My Next Dream: A bike and hike adventure in North Vietnam with a group of 20 of my friends. Hein has the entire itinerary worked out. We had to postpone our trip due to covid and now we are all trying to coordinate new dates that we can all go.
